price: Dájúdájú A fi àwọn àmì Wa àti ẹ̀rí tó yanjú rán (Ànábì) Mūsā níṣẹ́
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
